Win Capture

  • A signed contract, exceptions must be approved by ALT
    • A team selection isn't a win
  • Value reflects Total Proposal value
    • Includes ALL options
    • NOT dependent on funding arrival
  • Reflect final negotiated value
  • Don't split value unless separate binding proposals
    • Doesn’t include bid rate updates, escalation, etc.
    • Added scope is incremental


Loss Capture:

  • Record at proposal full value


Cancel Capture Examples:

  • No Bid determined / Customer conflicts/issues / Lack of funding / Redundant Oppty / Postponement / No longer required / No Response / Etc.


Ensure you:

  • Update Oppty Team
  • Validate Products/Rev Schedule Dates & Amounts
  • Enter a clear, concise Oppty Description. Spell out acronyms

Examine & Understand Requirements (PAIN)


Step 1: Complete Customer Facing Activity (templates below on status bar):

  • Prepare for sales conversation (Sponsor)
  • Confirm business issues and/or existing vision (Sponsor)
  • Diagnose the situation & economic impacts; and position unique capabilities (Sponsor)
  • Negotiate access to “Power Sponsor”, if needed
  • Confirm conversation findings and agree upon next steps


Step 2: Enter/Update the following elements in the appropriate related lists section to complete this Stage:

  • Complete Tollgate one of ASAP Process – Complete Opportunity 4-Ups Sales Cycle 1 (SC1)
  • Review and update Opportunity Team section with all team members
  • Enter Products & Revenue Schedule with dates & amount
  • Look two calendar years in advance when capturing Customer opportunity space

Diagnose Pain & Position Capabilities


Step 1: Complete Customer Facing Activity (templates below on status bar):

  • Prepare for sales conversation (Power)
  • Confirm business issues and/or existing vision (Power)
  • Diagnose the situation and position unique capabilities (Power)
  • Determine collaboration criteria
  • Propose a Collaboration Plan
  • Confirm conversation findings and agree upon a plan of next steps


Step 2: Enter/Update the following elements in the appropriate related lists section to complete this Stage:

  • Complete Tollgate two – Sales Leadership Approval SC1 use strategy guide to formulate customer/opp strategy
  • Update Opportunity Team section with all team members
  • Validate Products/Revenue Schedule dates & amounts

Finalize & Implement


Step 1: Complete Customer Facing Activity (templates below on status bar):

  • Prepare for final negotiations
  • Reach final agreement
  • Get necessary documents signed


Step 2: Enter/Update the following elements in the appropriate related lists section to complete this Stage:

  • Complete Award Notification Tollgate Actual Date
  • Update Opportunity Team section with all team members
  • Validate Products/Revenue Schedule dates & amounts
  • Files with pertinent customer facing activity
  • Next Step Date (in Tollgate Detail / Next Step section)

Create Demand


Step 1: Create your opportunity, completing all mandatory & known fields


Step 2: Complete Customer Facing Activity (templates below on status bar):

  • Conduct pre-call planning and micro-marketing activities
  • Identify potential contacts and issues
  • If an existing customer, check on current satisfaction
  • Use various approaches to stimulate interest / demand creation
  • Initial contact established


Step 3: Enter the following elements to complete this Stage:

  • Coordinate with M&PM (product roadmap tie out)
